translations.original: Link personal WhatsApp Web and show QR + connection logs.
translations.translated: 关联个人 WhatsApp Web 并显示二维码和连接日志。

translations.original: Send via your web session and print JSON result.
translations.translated: 通过你的 Web 会话发送并打印 JSON 结果。
在本地运行 WebSocket 网关。

translations.original: Run a dev Gateway (isolated state/config) on ws://127.0.0.1:19001.
translations.translated: 在 ws://127.0.0.1:19001 上运行开发网关（隔离状态/配置）。

translations.original: Kill anything bound to the default gateway port, then start it.
translations.translated: 终止占用默认网关端口的进程，然后启动网关。
通过 WebSocket 控制网关。

translations.original: Talk directly to the agent using the Gateway; optionally send the WhatsApp reply.
translations.translated: 通过网关直接与 AI 助手对话；可选发送 WhatsApp 回复。
通过你的 Telegram 机器人发送。

translations.original: Dev profile: isolate state under ~/.openclaw-dev, default gateway port 19001, and shift derived ports (browser/canvas)
translations.translated: 开发配置：在 ~/.openclaw-dev 下隔离状态，默认网关端口 19001，并移动派生端口（浏览器/画布）

translations.original: Use a named profile (isolates OPENCLAW_STATE_DIR/OPENCLAW_CONFIG_PATH under ~/.openclaw-<name>)
translations.translated: 使用命名配置文件（在 ~/.openclaw-<name> 下隔离 OPENCLAW_STATE_DIR/OPENCLAW_CONFIG_PATH）
